summary: Phase 2 Design System Enhancement - Frontend testing completed successfully. All visual elements and API integrations verified.

fixed.issue: StageTransition model required from_stage to be non-null, but contract creation passes None
fixed.fix: Made from_stage Optional in StageTransition model

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Design System Enhancement is complete. All features verified: Dashboard Tab with role-based tiles, Contracts Tab with stage pipeline filters and contract cards, Templates Tab with playbooks and tier badges, Navigation with pill-style buttons, Role Selector dropdown. Fixed a bug in contract creation where StageTransition model didn't allow null from_stage.

dashboard_tab.details: Role-based dashboard with styled tiles showing role header with icon, dashboard stats tiles with colored borders

contracts_tab.details: Contract lifecycle view with stage pipeline filters (Proposal, Bid Submitted, etc.), contract cards with stage-colored left borders, status badges, progress bars

contract_detail_panel.details: Opens when clicking contract card, shows lifecycle pipeline visualization and contract details

templates_tab.details: Playbooks section displays with tier badges and function groupings (SALES, MARKETING, OPERATIONS)

navigation.details: Premium navigation bar with pill-style buttons

role_selector.details: Dropdown in header to switch between roles (Executive, Coordinator, etc.) - shows Internal and External role categories

contract_creation.details: Create new contract dialog works correctly after bug fix

mocked_apis_list: /api/lifecycle/contracts - Contract data seeded via seed-demo endpoint
